thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: New york March 2017
thread.title_full: New york March 2017 - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: X8216QLpaulw
title: New york March 2017
text:
Overall a pleasant stay although we didn't spend much time in the hotel .
Bathroom very small and no wardrobe for clothes just a small clothes hanging area .staff in reception where helpfull and polite .
The Roger is well situated for subway conections and within walking distance to the Empire State Building a couple of blocks away ..
